strategy_name: TQQQ Daily 60d Bond Trend, 2d Bond Trend, Drawdown, Vix (Invest Copy)
plain_english_summary:
# Strategy: TQQQ Daily 60d Bond Trend, 2d Bond Trend, Drawdown, Vix (Invest Copy)
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/AAFfE3qtz2JCxAoT9Tbw/details

**Complexity**: High (8/10)
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 9 assets:

• **Stocks**: BND, BIL, QQQ, SVXY, TMF, TQQQ, IEF, UUP, GLD

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ If :
    ▪ If BND's cumulative-return (60-day) is greater than or equal to BIL's cumulative-return (60-day):
      - Rates are not going up:
        - Equal Weight Allocation:
          - If :
            - If QQQ's max-drawdown (10-day) is greater than 5.0:
              - QQQ was down recently:
                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                  - If :
                    - If SVXY's cumulative-return (5-day) is less than or equal to 0:
                      - High Vol:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - Buy TMF (100% of portfolio)
                    - Else branch:
                      - Low Vol:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
            - Else branch:
              - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
    ▪ Else branch:
      - Rates are going up:
        - Equal Weight Allocation:
          - If :
            - If BND's cumulative-return (2-day) is greater than or equal to 0:
              - Stopped short term, go 50/50:
                - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                  - Buy TQQQ (55% of portfolio)
                  - Interest Rate Safe Haven:
                    - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
                      (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
                      Assets: IEF, UUP, GLD, TMF
                      - Buy IEF (100% of portfolio)
                      - Buy UUP (100% of portfolio)
                      - Buy GLD (100% of portfolio)
                      - Buy TMF (100% of portfolio)
            - Else branch:
              - Interest Rate Safe Haven:
                - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
                  (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
                  Assets: IEF, UUP, GLD, TMF, TQQQ
                  - Buy IEF (100% of portfolio)
                  - Buy UUP (100% of portfolio)
                  - Buy GLD (100% of portfolio)
                  - Buy TMF (100% of portfolio)
                  - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
```

## Technical Details
• **Source Platform**: Composer

• **Slippage Model**: 0.10% per trade
